about.title: About me
about.main-text-1: I like making pretty things and I've been doing Calligraphy for the past five (5) years
about.main-text-2: One time in gymnasium-base on the subject called technic we had technical writing which I ended up liking very much and that's where it all began
about.main-text-3: By the way, cats > dogs, as well as eight stars
about.invitations-text: Once this is an actuall business I'll probably be writing tons of invitations

calligraphy.title: My Works
calligraphy.main-text-1: The biggest inspiration for my writing is music and video games. Many of my works are based on experimentation and having fun with typography
calligraphy.main-text-2: Fraktur, Blackletter and Copperplate - these are the calligraphy styles you'll see me use most often, but I enjoy Brush Lettering & Modern Calligraphy as well
calligraphy.main-text-3: If I had to use only one pen, it would be the Pilot Parrallel Pen. Very easy to use and brings great results
